channel.title: People can't connect to server? HELP ASAP!
channel.description:
Hello all, im Spyder and i have a problem. I recently went back to private servers and now im having trouble. I took out vista from my computer and put xp on it. I have a router (Linksys) for portfowarding. On RuneLocus it say's my servers online. But people cant connect still?
I need help ASAP because I would like to run my own P server. I have AIM, MSM, and Teamviewer. Please help me out.
-Thank You Spyder.[color=yellow][/color]

item.title: People can't connect to server? HELP ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“lilfmdude12, post:4, topic:320307”]lol i got a program witch will auto protfrord and lets ppl log in :D[/quote]Stop lieing so people beg on your knees to get the answer.

Ontopic:
Get PFconfig, I used it to portforward.

Read full topic
item.source: People can't connect to server? HELP ASAP!

item.title: People can't connect to server? HELP ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @dracoboy89 dracoboy89
item.description:
@dracoboy89 wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:7, topic:320307”]I suggest using uTorret, which I use, and never really have any problems with it.

Also, make sure there connecting to your NO-IP not your 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0, make sure there connecting to the correct Port aswell.

Make sure your Firewall is allowing connections from the server.[/quote]
um dude last i checked when i ran utorrent through my security system it said it had like 12 different viruses…

Read full topic
item.source: People can't connect to server? HELP ASAP!

item.title: People can't connect to server? HELP ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I suggest using uTorret, which I use, and never really have any problems with it.

Also, make sure there connecting to your NO-IP not your 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0, make sure there connecting to the correct Port aswell.

Make sure your Firewall is allowing connections from the server.

Read full topic
